title: Tammin Sursok throws a lavish party for her daughter Phoenix, six, compete with an elaborate cake
text:
She welcomed her second child, a daughter, with her husband Sean McEwen in January.

And on Saturday, the couple celebrated their oldest daughter, Phoenix Sursok-McEwan's sixth birthday with a lavish house party.

The former Home and Away star took to her Instagram page to give fans a glimpse of the colourful bash, which featured an elaborate unicorn cake and pastries.

Party time! On Saturday Tammin Sursok (pictured) threw a lavish party for her daughter Phoenix, six, which featured an elaborate Unicorn cake and massage therapists for the parents

Celebrating with her family and friends, the children's party featured a female dressed up as Disney Princess Elsa from the Frozen franchise.

The couple surprised fellow parents with a series of massage therapists who were on standby ready to de-stress guests.

The 36-year-old Pretty Little Liars star tended to hosting duties while holding onto her nine-month-old daughter Lennon.

Double duties: The 36-year-old Pretty Little Liars star tended to hosting duties while holding onto her nine-month-old daughter Lennon (left)

Celebrations: The couple surprised fellow parents with a series of massage therapists who were on standby ready to de-stress guests

This year's celebration at home with friends comes after the trio marked tot's fifth birthday last year with a family trip to Disneyland.

At the time, Tammin was six months pregnant with her second child.

'14 hours at Disneyland. My feet are swollen and my back has seized up walking 8 miles at 6 months pregnant,' Tammin at the time a caption.

Flashback: This year's celebration at home with friends comes after the trio marked tot's fifth birthday last year with a family trip to Disneyland. Pictured in 2018, Sean McEwen, Tammin Sursok and their daughter Phoenix

'But I would do it all again to see that permanent smile on your face. The love I have for you is endless.'

The actress married Sean McEwen in 2011, and the couple share two daughters: six-year-old Phoenix and nine-month-old Lennon.

Back in August, the doting mother spoke about how she balances motherhood with the desire to reboot her career.

Tammin told Sydney's Morning Show that her current situation is definitely 'a juggling act... You could have it all, but you just can't have it all at the same time.'
description: She welcomed her second child, a daughter, with her husband Sean McEwen in January.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
